description: The number of new daily coronavirus infections is 1,648, down from 3,815 on Sunday.
title: Coronavirus: Italy extends lockdown amid hopes of turning corner
title_page: Coronavirus: Italy extends lockdown amid hopes of turning corner - BBC News
maintext: Italians have been living under these strict rules for three weeks, with most shops, bars and restaurants shut. They are not allowed to leave their homes unless it is deemed essential.
